SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.rmi

Class RmiServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.rmi.RmiServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Remote
public class RmiServer extends Object implements VirtualServer
The RmiServer class represents a remote server that interacts with a virtual client using RMI (Remote Method Invocation) protocol. It implements the VirtualServer interface to allow the rmi client to call methods on the server via the RMI communication protocol.

    • callsList

      private final Queue<ServerQueueObject> callsList

  • Constructor Details

    • RmiServer

      public RmiServer(String ipaddress) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new RmiServer instance which allows multiple RmiClient to connect and interact with the controller. Forces hostname to be set to the ipaddress. Registers the RmiServer instance in the LocateRegistry as a UnicastRemoteObject on the port indicated by DV.RMI_PORT. Starts the executor().
      Parameters:
      ipaddress - the IP address of the server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs

  • Method Details

      Method of the VirtualServer that writes the given text to the RMI server log.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs

    • sendCommand

      public void sendCommand(ServerQueueObject obj) throws RemoteException

      Parameters:

    • getClientIP

      public String getClientIP() throws RemoteException
      Method of the VirtualServer that retrieves the IP address of the client connected. If not found return null.
      Specified by:
      getClientIP in interface VirtualServer
      Returns:
      the IP address of the client
      Throws:

    • generateToken

      public int generateToken(VirtualClient newConnection)
      Method of the VirtualServer that calls the Controller to ask it to generate a token. It is used for the first connection of a RmiClient.
      Specified by:
      generateToken in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      newConnection - the virtual client for which the token is generated.
      Returns:
      the generated token value.

    • connect

      public boolean connect(VirtualClient client, String username, Integer tempoToken, Integer token) throws RemoteException
      Method of the VirtualServer that calls the method Controller.connect(VirtualClient, String, Integer, Integer). It is used by a RmiClient to connect with the controller.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      client - the virtual client who wants controller connect to.
      username - the username chose by the client
      tempoToken - the temporary token.
      token - the token for the client
      Returns:
      true if the connection is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote communication

    • getRightConnection

      public VirtualClient getRightConnection(int token)
      Retrieves the VirtualClient object representing the right connection based on the provided token.
      Parameters:
      token - the token value used to identify the connection
      Returns:
      the VirtualClient object representing the right connection
